checkersGUI
Class CheckersTrainer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      checkersGUI.CheckersTrainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
CheckersGameListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CheckersTrainer
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, CheckersGameListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

A graphical user interface designed to allow the user to have two groups of CheckersPlayerInterfaces play each other and keep track of the game outcomes.

Version:
"v1.12" - 16 August 2008
Author:
Amos Yuen
See Also:
Serialized Form
